column5: Trolling for walters and pike yesterday morning,my line triggered and what do i get.This little guy!A little hungry feller! Oh well,it was nice to be out, and to send him back as well! Just wanted to share it with you guys,what a hoot!
what a hungry little fella lol
What was it thinking!???  Actually, I could be accused of doing the same sort of thing at the Mandarin buffet...
I've never caught anything on those jointed canadian wigglers. Maybe I'll have to target crappie with them next time.

If you do jedi,I was troling at top speed with a 30 pnd thrust minkota endura ,when he nibbled.Had a few others try and failed!  If I hit the mandarin Mike Pike,I'll bring the lure and run around with it.Seeing that you are accussed of the same thing(just kidden)!I may throw it in the pond at the entrance way
Ya know, Vinnimon, I've targetted Crappie there and have never really had much luck.  Now I know why.  I've been using micro-grubs and such when I should have been using big jointed plugs!  lol
hahaha thats funny! my bud was tossing a giant bucktail spinner not long ago and brought in a perch.
LOL I've had similiar experiences, its very entertaining watching perch school around your lure fins flared
